divs: Sighting DetailsI took this picture of the uvs hospital chopper takeing off . I did not see the disk over layed by the sun untill i downloaded the picture to my computer . I have no idea what this is . I would like to know what this is and if it will help .
Summary: just a photo taken of the hospital chopper takeing off with a sundog and disk infront of sun
